scripts.dev: bun run dev:frontend & bun run dev:backend & wait
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:frontend && bun run build:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist shared/dist
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:shared && bun run type-check:frontend && bun run type-check:backend
scripts.health-check: bun run type-check && bun run lint
